generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Item Components Kinetic Weapon Kinetic Effect Conditions
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Conditions that need to be satisfied for a specific effect of a kinetic weapon to be applied.

fields.title: Max Duration
fields.description: Time, in ticks, during which the effect can be applied after "delay" elapses. If negative, the effect is applied indefinitely.

fields.title: Min Relative Speed
fields.description: Minimum relative speed of the user with respect to the target (projected onto the view vector via a dot product) required for the effect to be applied.

fields.title: Min Speed
fields.description: Minimum user's speed (projected onto the view vector via a dot product) required for the effect to be applied.
